name: Bunscape
description:
This little bunny must collect all the carrots before time runs out. It won't be an easy task thanks to the evil fox that will chase him nonstop.

Would you be able to finish all the levels on this difficult, fast paced platformer game?

Game dev story

This game was one of the first projects I've ever finished. I had drawn a little game boy mockup in the past so in 24 hs I made a platformer game with ImpactJS (Javascript, of course). The original released game had only four levels, this one is a bit improved.

Controls (Keyboard only)

  • [ Arrows ]  Movement
  • [ Space }  Jump/Action
